# Preamble

Set working directory.

```{r}
setwd("~/Projects/NewProject/scripts")
```

Load libraries.

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(svglite)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
```

Reproducibility steps.

```{r}
sessionInfo() %>% print(locale = FALSE)
set.seed(as.integer(as.Date("2016-12-27")))
```

Source user-defined functions.

```{r, eval = TRUE}
sapply(list.files("../lib", full.names = TRUE), source)
```
